column1: 有谁知道巴塞罗那足球俱乐部邮箱或者联系方式，官网找不到因为疫情原因机票取消了去不了了，想尝试下能不能退，试了几个邮箱都没有回复，微博也没人回复

给过你邮箱和电话啊：FCB OFFICES Arístides Maillol s/n, 08028 Barcelona (vehicle entrance at gate 14)Phone number: (+34) 902 1899 00Phone attention available: From Monday to Friday from 9am to 8pm, Saturdays from 10am to 2pmSummer timetable: (from June 1 to August 15).Opening hours on match days:Midweek football matches at the Camp Nou: from 9am until half time in the match.Saturday football matches at the Camp Nou: from 10am until half time in the match.Sunday and bank holiday football matches at the Camp Nou: from two hours before kickoff until half time in the match.TICKET OFFICEAccess 15 ticket offices:Opening hours (high season): 9:15am to 7:30pm(low season): 9:45am to 6:30pm except Sundays (9:45am to 2:30pm)Match days 9:15am until kick-offBoulevard:Opening hours (high season): 9:15am to 7:30pm(low season): 9:45am to 6:30pm except Sundays (9:45am to 2:30pm)Match days (football first team): opening hours depending on high or low season and until the game half time.BARÇA STADIUM TOUR & MUSEUMAv. Joan XXIII s/n 08028 Barcelona (Acces Nº 9)Telephone number: (+34) 902 1899 00E-mail: oab@fcbarcelona.cat微博、邮箱不回复，你直接打电话问不就好了！
如果是博物馆和球场tour的票，oab@fcbarcelona.cat如果是球赛的电子票或者能够修改邮寄地址的实体票，挂在viagogo之类的国外二手平台卖了吧
newsletter@email.fcbarcelona.com 我只有这个发资讯的邮箱，不知道有没有用
你在哪里预订的 你就去哪里试试
